name: GBStudio 3 - Animated Tile Tutorial
description:
This is a work in progress tutorial about how to animated tiles using GSVM scripts and Timer scripts. There are 5 scenes, each cover a different aspect of creating the script code. Its is based on NalaFala (Yousurname) "Background Tile Swapping Guide for GB Studio 3" tutorial https://gist.github.com/Y0UR-U5ERNAME/b1cdf7f3afff6c14dfa557dc5e6b1572 but I filled in the blanks for people new to GBVM, like me :)

Youtube Tutorial Walkthorugh
When I'm done I'll be uploading youtube video with voice over

Source Code
https://github.com/phinioxGlade/gbstudio-3-animated-tile-tutorial
